ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR(
AND ( ISPICKVAL($User.Country__c,'KOREA') , Exclusive_Campaign__r.KOREA__c = false ),
AND( ISPICKVAL( $User.MANAGEMENT_ZONE_LEVEL__c , '13'), NOT(ISPICKVAL($User.Country__c,'KOREA')), Exclusive_Campaign__r.ASIA_NORTH_sans_COREE_CHINE__c = false ),
AND ( ISPICKVAL($User.MANAGEMENT_ZONE_LEVEL__c , '17') , Exclusive_Campaign__r.CHINA__c = false ),
AND ( ISPICKVAL($User.MANAGEMENT_ZONE_LEVEL__c , '2') , Exclusive_Campaign__r.JAPAN__c = false ),
AND ( ISPICKVAL($User.MANAGEMENT_ZONE_LEVEL__c , '15') , Exclusive_Campaign__r.EMEA__c = false ),
AND ( ISPICKVAL($User.MANAGEMENT_ZONE_LEVEL__c , '3') , Exclusive_Campaign__r.AMERICAS__c = false ),
AND ( ISPICKVAL($User.MANAGEMENT_ZONE_LEVEL__c , '14') , Exclusive_Campaign__r.ASIA_SOUTH__c = false ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The exclusive campaign is not active in your zone!
